! dpal ayon chen pos phyag na rdo rje dregs pa kun 'dul nA ga bdud 'dul nag po'i rgyud las 'phros pa'i sgrub skor cha tshang gnyis su mdzad nas lha lcam skye mtha'i don du gter gnas gnyis su sbas pa ldang lha'i brag nas sku skye sngon? ma rin cen tshul rdor gyis spyan drangs pa sngar smos zin la /

sa hor dur sa dbus gtsang kun la 'debsH mchod rten 'og nas thod pa khyi yis g.yengH bsam yas mchims phur sbas pa'i gter kha 'diH mi bzhag 'don pa'i rtags de bstan nas 'byungH gter ston dri med 'od zer zhes bya 'byungH zhes lung gis zin pa'i gter ston dri med 'od zer ram kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po klong chen rab 'byams par grags pas bsam yas mchims bu nas zab gter gyi shog dril 'ga' zhig spyan 'dren par mdzad na'ang /
gtso bor bi mA la'i snying tig ces zab ba pod? bzhi /

mdzod bdun ngal gso skor gsum /

bla ma yang tig yid bzhin nor bu'i skor la /

dngos sam sprul pa'i phyag rgyas @# / /
shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /

ngan song gi sgo khegs /

rab tu spros med kyi dbang chog 'od kyi dra ba'i steng nas nyams su len long ma byung yang rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du skye zhing phal pa rnams par do dang mchog rnams tshe 'dir grol ba bzhugs stangs bzhi la brten nas zhing khams bzhi dang sku gsum du bzhugs pa'i tshig dbang rnams legs par mnos nas /

thems med /

drug pa sprin phung ni /

thems med /
dus bzhi'i rim pa gnad du bsnun thabs khregs chod thod rgal 'od gsal bsgom pa'i gnad yig bdud rtsi dri med /

'khor lo skor gsum rtag tu 'od gsal sbyor / /
zhes lta stangs gzigs stangs gnad kyi snying po ston pa gnad gsum chos nyid 'khor lo dngos dang rmi lam bag chags 'brel rgyun gcod pa'i nyin mtshan gnyis med 'od gsal 'khor lo /

nyin mtshan ting 'dzin go rim gsal bar ston @# / /

bcu pa nor bu ni /
nor bu skor gsum mtshog dang thun mong sgrub / /

thems med /
rkyen ngan lam bsgyur yang zab mthar thug yid bzhin snying po /

bcu gcig pa me long ni /

bcu gnyis pa snyan brgyud ni /
snyan brgyud skor gsum bar do'i gdams pa ston / /

bcu gsum pa sbu gri ni /
de dag rnams kyi chos mdzod bsrung ba la / /

zhes bltar rang dang dam chos legs par bsrung zhing 'gal byed dgra dpung cham la 'bebs pa dpal sngags kyi bdag mo'i gsang sgrub snying gi dum bu'am snying gi spu gri /

de yang /
